inputs.name: Type
inputs.description: Scalar data type for the new output volume.

inputs.name: InputVolume
inputs.description: Input volume, the volume to cast.

inputs.name: OutputVolume
inputs.description: Output volume, cast to the new type.

description:
Cast a volume to a given data type.
Use at your own risk when casting an input volume into a lower precision type!
Allows casting to the same type as the input volume.
name: Cast Scalar Volume
label: Cast Scalar Volume
